Text:
This is a good file.
Audio & video quality seem good to my non-professional perceptions.

English subtitles can be found here:
http://subscene.com/subtitles/nono-the-zigzag-kid/english/692757

Falls in the class of kids movies, i think, so for a subtitled movie it is not for everybody.  But it seems interesting and since i havent finished watching it yet i will not judge it.  The imdv link points correctly.
